content.rendered:
Directed by Milap Zaveri

Written by Milap Zaveri

Cast Riteish Deshmukh (Vishnu). Sidharth Malhotra (Raghu). Tara Sutaria (Zoya). Rakul Preet Singh (Aarzoo) .Bisham Ahuja.Sabina Nizmuddin Ansari. Sanjay Bhatia (Doctor).Nikita Dhondida Dangle.DJ Farman. Nora Fatehi (Lead Dancer in ‘Ek Toh Kum Zindagani’ song).Dhivyani Gandhi. Vaishali Gaur (Gaitonde’S Daughter). Varinder Singh Ghuman (Rakka). Virendra Singh Ghuman (Rakka).Arya Parvateesam Gulla. Krithika Iyer (Zoya’s Friend). Anant Jog(Gaitonde). Neeraj Kalra (Jailor). Om Kanojiya (Time Pass).Bikramjeet Kanwarpal.Ayush Mahesh Khedekar. Ravi Kishan (ACP Ravi Yadav). Godaan Kumar (Shafi). Amit Mehra (Gaitonde’s son). Mayank Kumar Mishra (Lateef).Suhasini Mulay. Vincent Naidu (Anna’s Henchmen). Nassar (Narayan Anna).Akash Akki Nath. Uday Nene (Gopi). Nishad (Prison Guard). Puja (Zoya’S Friend). Alina Qazi (Payal). Nishad Raj Rana (Jail Guard). Shaad Randhawa (Mazhar). Shivansu Sachan (Gun boy (as Shivansu)).Aditya Raj Sen. Swati Seth (Zoya’s friend).Sagar Chandrakant Shivsharan. Deependra Singh (Biku).Dhanveer Deepak Singh.Dhivya Vijay Singh.Pratap Vijay Singh.Nalin Swami. Surinder Thakur (Vishnu’Smen). Wilson Tiger (Anna’s Man). Renu Verma (Gaitonde’s Wife). Jay Yadav (Tipu). Jayesh Yadav (Yashpal). Surender Thakur (Goon (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Monisha Advani. Nikkhil Advani. Madhu Bhojwani. Karan Joshi. Bendev Junior. Bhushan Kumar. Divya Khosla Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Priyanka Mehrotra. Satish Poddar. Rameshchandra Yadav

Production Emmay Entertainment
